Text: Russian International School in Dubai:  It follows the Russian Curriculum, the only school in Dubai to do so.

Text: Russian International School in Dubai:  Originally established in 1996 as the Dubai Russian School; it was a villa-based school with 60 students, founded by Najibullah Najib.
